import React from 'react'; import { MultiStageFormData, CompanyInfo } from '../../types/FormTypes'; interface Props { formData: MultiStageFormData; updateFormData: ( section: K, data: Partial ) => void; nextPage: () => void; previousPage: () => void; skipPage: () => void; } export default function CompanyInfoPage({ formData, updateFormData }: Props) { const data = formData.companyInfo; // Pre-select English if not set if (!data.companyLanguage) { updateFormData('companyInfo', { companyLanguage: 'English' }); } const handleInputChange = (field: keyof CompanyInfo, value: string | boolean | File) => { updateFormData('companyInfo', { [field]: value }); }; // Use the same country list as DeveloperInfoPage const countries = [ { code: 'AF', name: 'Afghanistan', phone: '+93' }, { code: 'AL', name: 'Albania', phone: '+355' }, { code: 'DZ', name: 'Algeria', phone: '+213' }, { code: 'AD', name: 'Andorra', phone: '+376' }, { code: 'AO', name: 'Angola', phone: '+244' }, { code: 'AR', (Los Angeles, Vancouver)', 'UTC-7 (Denver, Phoenix)', 'UTC-6 (Chicago, Mexico City)', 'UTC-5 (New York, Toronto, Lima)', 'UTC-4 (Santiago, Caracas)', 'UTC-3 (Buenos Aires, SÃ£o Paulo)', 'UTC-2 (South Georgia & Sandwich Islands)', 'UTC-1 (Azores)', 'UTC+0 (London, Lisbon)', 'UTC+1 (Berlin, Paris, Rome)', 'UTC+2 (Athens, Cairo, Johannesburg)', 'UTC+3 (Moscow, Nairobi, Istanbul)', 'UTC+4 (Dubai, (Adelaide, Darwin)', 'UTC+10 (Sydney, Melbourne, Vladivostok)', 'UTC+11 (Solomon Islands, New Caledonia)', 'UTC+12 (Auckland, Fiji)' ]; const languages = [ 'English', 'Spanish', 'French', 'German', 'Italian', 'Portuguese', 'Russian', 'Chinese (Simplified)', 'Japanese', 'Korean', 'Arabic', 'Hindi' ]; const skillLevels = [ 'Beginner - Never made a website or developed code', 'Intermediate - I know about websites and servers', 'Advanced - I Code', 'Rather Not Say' ]; return (
{!data.usePersonalInfo && ( <>

Company Information (if different from personal)

handleInputChange('companyName', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="Your Company Name" required={!data.usePersonalInfo} />
handleInputChange('companyWebsite', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="https://yourcompany.com" required={!data.usePersonalInfo} />
handleInputChange('companyEmail', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="contact@yourcompany.com" required={!data.usePersonalInfo} />
handleInputChange('companyStreetAddress', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="123 Business Ave, Suite 100" required={!data.usePersonalInfo} />
handleInputChange('companyCity', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="Business City" required={!data.usePersonalInfo} />
handleInputChange('companyStateProvince', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="California / Ontario / Bavaria" required={!data.usePersonalInfo} />
handleInputChange('companyPostalCode', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="12345 / A1B 2C3 / 12345-678" required={!data.usePersonalInfo} />
handleInputChange('companyPhone', e.target.value)} className="w-1/2 px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="123-456-7890" required={!data.usePersonalInfo} />
handleInputChange('companyUsername', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="company_username" required={!data.usePersonalInfo} />
{languages.map(lang => ( ))}
handleInputChange('companyGithub', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="company-github" />
handleInputChange('companyLinkedin', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="https://linkedin.com/company/yourcompany" />
handleInputChange('companyTiktok', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="https://tiktok.com/@yourcompany" />
handleInputChange('companyYoutube', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="https://youtube.com/@yourcompany" />
handleInputChange('companyInstagram', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="https://instagram.com/yourcompany" />
handleInputChange('companyFacebook', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="https://facebook.com/yourcompany" />
handleInputChange('companyTwitter', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="https://x.com/yourcompany" />
)}

File Uploads

{ const file = e.target.files?.[0]; if (file) handleInputChange('companyLogo', file); }} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />

Upload your company logo or app icon

{ const file = e.target.files?.[0]; if (file) handleInputChange('profilePhoto', file); }} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />

Upload a profile photo or avatar

); }
